var t = async_test("strokeRect of Nx0 pixels draws a closed line with joins");
_addTest(function(canvas, ctx) {

  ctx.strokeStyle = '#0f0';
  ctx.lineWidth = 250;
  ctx.lineJoin = 'round';
  ctx.strokeRect(100, 25, 100, 0);
  _assertPixel(canvas, 50,25, 0,255,0,255);

});
</script>
